title: ExifInformationAssertion
description: Represents Exif metadata in JSON-LD form. Partial coverage of common exif fields.

@context.description: JSON-LD context referencing exif = 'http://ns.adobe.com/exif/1.0/' and possibly exifEX = 'http://cipa.jp/exif/2.32/'

exif:Make.description: Manufacturer of the capturing device, e.g. 'Canon', 'Nikon'

exif:Model.description: Model of the capturing device, e.g. 'EOS R5'

exif:LensMake.description: Manufacturer of the lens, if separate from camera maker.

exif:LensModel.description: Model of the lens, if applicable.

exif:DateTimeOriginal.description: Date/Time when the original image data was generated (local camera time). e.g. '2021:06:28 16:34:11'

exif:ExposureTime.description: Exposure time, typically as fraction of a second. e.g. '1/125'

exif:ISOSpeedRatings.description: ISO speed or sensitivity setting e.g. 100, 400, 1600.

exif:FocalLength.description: Focal length of the lens in mm e.g. '50mm'.

exif:Flash.description: Flash setting or mode. Could be 'Flash fired' or 'Flash did not fire'.

exif:GPSLatitudeRef.description: Indicates whether latitude is north or south latitude (e.g. 'N' or 'S').

exif:GPSLatitude.description: Latitude in degrees, minutes, seconds format e.g. '39,21.102N' or numeric decimal. Implementation dependent.

exif:GPSLongitudeRef.description: Indicates whether longitude is east or west (e.g. 'E' or 'W').

exif:GPSLongitude.description: Longitude in degrees, minutes, seconds format e.g. '74,26.5737W' or numeric decimal. Implementation dependent.

exif:GPSAltitudeRef.description: 0 = above sea level, 1 = below sea level. Part of Exif standard.

exif:GPSAltitude.description: Altitude in meters (possibly a fraction). e.g. '100963/29890'

exif:GPSTimeStamp.description: Time (UTC) of GPS data record. e.g. '2021-06-28T16:34:11Z'
